mapper.sql: select a.advertisement_id as advertisementId, u.user_id as userId, u.account_id as accountId, a.title, a.start_date as startDate, a.end_date as endDate, a.ad_img_urls as adImgUrl, a.url, a.img_file_names as imgFileName, a.ad_status as adStatus from advertisement a inner join users u on u.user_id = a.user_id
mapper.select: select ad_img_urls as adImgUrl, url, ad_status as adStatus from advertisement where ad_status = #{adStatus}
mapper.insert: insert into advertisement(user_id, title, start_date, end_date, ad_img_urls, url, img_file_names, ad_status) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{adImgUrl}, #{url}, #{imgFileName}, #{adStatus})
mapper.update: update advertisement set title = #{title}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, url = #{url}, ad_img_urls = #{adImgUrl}, img_file_names = #{imgFileName} where advertisement_id = #{advertisementId}
